page.title: 10OAKLEY YOUTH CENTRE
page.content: house date back to 1865.The building is set in 6 acres of orchard and grassland.Children's description{The {building is high,a big bell still {works, it looks like a church.The {walls are made of mud,only place made {of proper bricks is the kitchen.There {are big,strong carved oak doors and {carved wooden walls,some are smooth.I {think the building is old and creepy. {People say their is a ghost because of {a stain on the wall that looks like a {ghost.}Most children attend clubs.{"I {go to STARLIGHT CLUB 20p.to get in {they sell sweets,drinks.I play in the {woods,sandpit and on roller skates.We {play football,tables are goals.They do {ballet,play musical chairs,trampoline. {Sister,Mum and Dad go to Oakley.We all {play table tennis and have a disco. {They are building a BMX track in the {woods.I go to judo club.I like it }
